title: kAlanai udaittavan
sahitya:
kAlanai udaittavan bAlanaik-kUvi en kavalaiyait-tIrr kuyilE


anupallavi

  jnAlamellAm pugazh jnAna paNDita durai nambina pErgaLai nATTATril viDamATTAn


caraNam    inbattait-tandavan innalait-tIrAnO idayattait-toTTavan en mukham pArAnO
anbai aLittavarai aLLi aNaiyAnO Ashai arindukoNDum pEshAmal iruppAnO
